item.title: Politics
item.description: Benjamin Franklin the polymath. Lee Kuan Yew a brilliant mind, who (very rarely) cried at the prospect of having to abandon Chinese and Indians upon separating from Malaysia [YT, TW], who made singapore prosperous and secure despite democracy and a very divided population. Robert Smalls Born into slavery. Started out with seriously unpleasant menial jobs. Taught himself to read. More importantly, taught himself navigational trigonometry. This is not simple to do yourself.
